q: - and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured,'' Mr Eric Schmidt wrote in a blog post. He added that Mr Page would merge Google's technology and business vision , while he would stay on to focus on external issues, like`` deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships''. Mike Pence of Indiana and Greg Walden of Oregon unveiled this week the Broadcaster Freedom Act, which would ban the FCC from forcing broadcasters to give free airtime to opposing sides on controversial issues. The American people cherish freedom, especially freedom of speech and of the press, said Mike Pence , a former radio talk show host who introduced the same bill in the last session of Congress when Democrats still controlled the House.
